mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM tbl_bbs
SELECT * FROM tbl_bbs ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_bbs( memberId, title, content, displayDate ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{displayDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_bbs SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, displayDate = #{displayDate} WHERE idx = #{idx}
